sentences.english: This is what Sahaja Yoga should make out of you.
sentences.chinese: 這是霎哈嘉瑜珈應當讓你學到的。

sentences.english: There are eight major schools of yoga, each varying in its area of emphasis.
sentences.chinese: 瑜珈有八大流派，每派強調的領域有異。

sentences.english: The Yoga repairs holds secret and important is a statute book which the theory and the time participate in government mutually.
sentences.chinese: 瑜珈修持祕要是理論和時間互相參政的法典。

sentences.english: This is true both of Eastern yoga and of the methods practiced in the West.
sentences.chinese: 東方的瑜珈術及西方所實行的方法都是如此。

sentences.english: If you have learnt it, you have mastered Sahaja Yoga.
sentences.chinese: 如果你學會了這點，你就掌握了霎哈嘉瑜珈。

sentences.english: The goals of yoga are varied and range from improving health to achieving Moksha (enlightenment).
sentences.chinese: 瑜珈的目的各不相同，從強身健體到尋求開悟。

sentences.english: This article explains how to do yoga with positive sentences.
sentences.chinese: 本文闡述瞭如何帶着積極心態做瑜珈。

sentences.english: How effective yoga is as an exercise?
sentences.chinese: 與老熊的瑜珈比比？人真是太複雜了。

sentences.english: Yoga and curry are words from India.
sentences.chinese: 瑜珈，咖哩粉是來自印度的詞彙。

sentences.english: Yoga's origins lie in2 Hindu philosophy, which was developed thousands of years ago in India.
sentences.chinese: 瑜珈起源於印度哲學，在印度已經發展了數千年。

sentences.english: Climbing is more related to Yoga or some sort of Tai Chi or whatever.
sentences.chinese: 攀爬與瑜珈的關係更相近，或者類似於太極之類的。

sentences.english: They practiced yoga daily and spent hours in meditation.
sentences.chinese: 他們每天練瑜珈並花數小時沉思冥想。

sentences.english: Turlington is a serious student of yoga.
sentences.chinese: 特林頓亦是一位虔誠的瑜珈修行者。

sentences.english: Oroya peruviana Make time to practice meditation, yoga, and prayer.
sentences.chinese: 讓時間來練習幻想，瑜珈和祈禱。

sentences.english: She travels nationally and is regularly featured in yoga and health publications.
sentences.chinese: 她遊歷過許多國家，並能定期推薦瑜珈和健康出版物。

sentences.english: The Yogi is spiritually one with the entire universe around him.
sentences.chinese: 瑜珈信徒在精神上被整個宇宙所圍繞。

definition: (Tw) weight training (abbr. for 重量訓練|重量训练[zhong4 liang4 xun4 lian4])
cupping glass/fire cupping (acupressure technique of Chinese medicine, with fired vacuum cup applied to the skin)/ventouse (vacuum method used in obstetrics)
table tennis/table tennis ball (Tw)/billiards/pool/snooker (HK, Singapore, Malaysia)
variant of 紓壓|纾压[shu1 ya1]
Wing Chun/same as 詠春拳|咏春拳[yong3 chun1 quan2]/Yongchun - "Singing Spring Fist" (Chinese martial art)
